text: In one of his last interviews, Anthony Bourdain said he felt a ` ` responsibility'' to live for his 11 - year - old daughter, Ariane. During his final interview with PEOPLE in February, the Parts Unknown host said he felt ` ` some responsibility'' to ` ` at least try to live'' for Ariane. ` ` I also do feel I have things to live for, ” Bourdain told the magazine. “ There have been times, honestly, in my life that I figured, ‘ I ’ ve had a good run — why not just do this stupid thing, this selfish thing … jump off a cliff into water of indeterminate depth.'''Before Bourdain and his ex - wife Ottavia Busia welcomed their daughter, he would go to
